Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Lake Park/55th
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th, Hyde Park, 57th & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Lake Park/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Park, 55th, Hyde Park, 57th & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Lake Park/55th.

Allow extra travel time.
